title: AMAZING Sommerville Apartment - 2 Rooms for Rent
posting_body: This apartment in East Somerville is ~1100 square feet.
Two upstairs rooms are available for 9/1/22 for 12 month lease.
Apartment Features:
In-unit washer/dryer
Black Tile floors in kitchen and bathroom
Wood floors in living room and bedrooms
Spacious closets
Multiple storage spaces
MASSIVE back yard, grill, pavilion
Free parking space
The apartment is clean and comfortable with updated furnishings.
The current tenant is a guy in his mid-20s with 9-5 jobs in sales.
The apartment is entirely furnished so any new tenant would only need furniture for their room.
No central air
but we have extra window AC units available, no cost.
The outdoor space is over 1000 square feet which is shared with one neighbor (downstairs apartment).
Grill is included and access to basement storage and 2 sheds.
The landlord is attentive to any needs and is proactive with updates to the property.
Location is also great, being only 10 minutes walking to Assembly Square.
Neighborhood is safe and friendly.
Pharmacies, grocery stores, barber shops, liquor stores, restaurants, retail shopping, public transit are all within walking distance.
Contact US for a tour if you're interested!
